turnkey.title: TURNKEY SOLUTIONS
turnkey.description: Ready-made IP blocks and IC blueprints
turnkey.details: Turnkey IC Design Projects: Full cycle of IC development from specification to qualified silicon prototypes. We assemble a dedicated team for a project with an option of team transfer upon the project completion

customization.title: CUSTOMIZATION
customization.description: Proven remedies adjusted to your application
customization.details: Customization of own IPs and 3rd party IPs: We customize our own IPs and third-party IPs under the client's needs. We also provide support and maintenance for the customized IPs

rd.title: R&D
rd.description: Unique keys based on many years of experience
rd.details: R&D center setup assistance: We help our clients to setup their own R&D centers in Vietnam. We provide consultations, help with hiring and training of engineers

mission.title: Mission
mission.text1:
Sirius Semiconductors was established to
reach an ambitious target to turn Vietnam into a technological powerhouse.
mission.text2: We are here <blue>to provide expertise, technologies, service and products in microelectronics</blue> for partners in a Vietnamese market and way beyond

icDesign.title: IC Design
icDesign.content: We provide a full stack of Semiconductors Design & Programming services for FPGA, ASIC, Structures ASIC solutions for Digital, Analogue, Radio Frequency (RF) & Photonic applications.

riscV.title: RISC-V core.
riscV.description: Open standard instruction set architecture with full dev toolkit and debug printed circuit

dma.title: DMA-controller.
dma.description: AMBA APB interface for control/ status register access and 2 AXI4 master interfaces: for data transfers and for scatter gather tasks access

sram.title: SRAM.
sram.description: AXI4 to memory bridge with SECDEC and exclusive access support

gpio.title: GPIO with APB/AXI interface.
gpio.description: GPIO controller with AXI4/ APB interfaces

axi.title: AXI interconnect.
axi.description: System Interconnect with support of AXI3/ AXI4/ AHB/ APB interfaces

spi.title: SPI master interface.
spi.description: SPI master controller with AXI4 interface

i2c.title: I2C master interface.
i2c.description: I2C master controller with AXI4 interface

gpt.title: GPT.
gpt.description: General purpose timer with AXI4/ APB interfaces

analogPll.title: Analog PLL.
analogPll.description: PLL with frequency up to 5 GHz (TSMC 28 HPC+)

software.title: Software & Technologies
software.content: Sirius also develops a stack of Microelectronics design technologies, including Electronics Design Automation (EDA) software which secures time-2-market & price-2-quality competitive advantages for its customers.
